channel.title: SUBTITLES AND WIDESCREEN
channel.description: I keep changing the options to allow subtitles and 16:9 widescreen but the changes never go into effect. I have similar issues with all the other settings as well :'(

item.title: SUBTITLES AND WIDESCREEN
item.dc:creator: The_Scientist
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

put -w and -h in your launch options depending on your resolution

I would use

-w 1920 -h 1080

but yours may differ. Hope that helps!

That works a treat!
Thanks.

item.description:
It’s not a bug, just some strange glitch. When you select 16:9 don’t click “ok” or “apply”, just select the resolution you want from the box above AFTER you select 16:9.

item.title: SUBTITLES AND WIDESCREEN
item.dc:creator: besser
item.description:
I had the same problem with widescreen. I changed the aspect ratio to 16:9 but it didnt take effect.

But I found a solution that worked for me. After changing the aspect ratio I clicked the advanced graphics setup open and just clicked ok. After the advanced setup window was closed it allowed me to cahnge the resolution to what I liked and it stayed that way too.

Hope this helps.

item.title: SUBTITLES AND WIDESCREEN
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
please ensure that the folder placed into “sourcemods” is named “BMS”:
\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods[b]BMS

[/b]This can help resolve issues with game saves, subtitles, chapter names, and possibly any other issues that may be caused by utilizing the wrong folder name.

Let me know if this is the case.
